text:
AnyConnect | Multiple positions | Louisville KY, Montreal QC | ONSITE | FullTime

AnyConnect does software for connected cameras and other connected devices. That means we are looking for all kinds of talent. Camera Stack: Embedded Linux, audio / video, BLE, Wifi Direct. Network stack: STUN/TURN/ICE. Mobile apps. Services stack: Front end, back end.

We are small, well funded, profitable, growing fast and building really cool products and technologies.

Details at http://anyconnect.com/careers
